Class Candidate

  • java.lang.Object
    • Candidate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Candidate>
    public class Candidate
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Candidate>
    Candidate class encapsulates an election Candidate. It tracks what party he/she belongs to, his/her name, his/her votes, etc. It holds an association to the Party of the Candidate and his/her Ballots. Inherits the Comparable class to sort on the Candidate's vote count.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Candidate anotherCand)
        Implementing the compareTo method of the Comparable class. Ties are broken randomly using Random.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Candidate>
        Parameters:
        anotherCand - The other Candidate used in the comparison.
        Returns:
        1 if this Candidate had less votes, -1 if this Candidate had more votes. Ties are broken randomly.
